long_description: Sportlegs(R) capsules incorporate natural vitamins and minerals to help reduce muscle pain related to workouts. Increases blood lactate levels to prevent your body from releasing lactic acid into the muscles-which prevents fatigue and increases performance. Take 1 hour before exercise to reduce muscle burn and increase stamina. Continue to use after exercising to prevent muscle fatigue and reduce recovery time. Ingredients: vitamin D (77 iu), calcium (154 mg) and magnesium (77 mg). Other ingredients: Hypromellose (vegetable capsule), water, sucrose, cornstarch, gelatin and dl-a-tocopherol (antioxidant). Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Sportlegs(R) capsules incorporate natural vitamins and minerals to help reduce muscle pain related to workouts.
